content: size approximately 16 x 12 designed by laura wiley http //www mommysmarketplace com level beginner materials needed red heart super saver warm brown 2 7oz skeins red heart super saver aran 2 7oz skeins m 9 0mm hook scissors yarn needle stitches used chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet gauge with m hook 9 single_crochet and 11 row = 4 using 1 strand of each color chain 25 row 1 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook and in each chain across turn 24 single_crochet row 2 chain 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet across turn repeat row 2 until piece measures approximately 14 ½ finish off and weave in ends edging round 1 with right side facing using 2 stands of yarn join yarn in any corner chain 1 3 single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet across the top and down the sides putting 3 single_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to beginning single_crochet round 2 ch1 single_crochet in same stitch and in each stitch around join with slip stitch to beginning single_crochet finish off and weave in ends please note that the yarn amounts listed will make 6 placemats copyright © 2008 laura wiley please do not copy my pattern reproduce it in any form or share it with others you may sell items that you crochet from it on a limited basis
